dataset.title: Environmental and ecological controls of coral community metabolism on Palmyra Atoll

creator.organizationName: Department of Environmental Earth System Science, Stanford University

associatedParty.organizationName: PADL Data Manager, Univerity of California Santa Barbara

abstract.para: These data sets describe Palmyra Atoll coral reef Environmental and ecological controls of coral community metabolism. Data was collected between August—October 2012. Data in this package was published under: Koweek, D., R. Dunbar, J. Rogers, G. Williams, N. Price, D. Mucciarone, and L. Teneva, Environmental and ecological controls of coral community metabolism on Palmyra Atoll Coral Reefs.
There are six data files associated with Koweek et al.
This data was originally published at NOAA’s National Center for Environmental Information. See Data Provenance section for more details.

keywordSet.keyword: partial pressure of carbon dioxide - water

intellectualRights.para: This information is released under the Creative Commons license - Attribution - CC BY (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). The consumer of these data (

herein) is required to cite it appropriately in any publication that results from its use. The Data User should realize that these data may be actively used by others for ongoing research and that coordination may be necessary to prevent duplicate publication. The Data User is urged to contact the authors of these data if any questions about methodology or results occur. Where appropriate, the Data User is encouraged to consider collaboration or co-authorship with the authors. The Data User should realize that misinterpretation of data may occur if used out of context of the original study. While substantial efforts are made to ensure the accuracy of data and associated documentation, complete accuracy of data sets cannot be guaranteed. All data are made available

The Data User should be aware, however, that data are updated periodically and it is the responsibility of the Data User to check for new versions of the data. The data authors and the repository where these data were obtained shall not be liable for damages resulting from any use or misinterpretation of the data. Thank you.

contact.organizationName: Department of Environmental Earth System Science, Stanford University

description.para: Please see Koweek et al 2014 for detailed methods and instrumentation on how this data was collected.
See the Palmyra Atoll Data Library Github for details on how matlab files were converted into .csv

personnel.organizationName: Department of Environmental Earth System Science, Stanford University

dataTable.entityName: Koweek et al Biogeochemical data from Eulerian measurements at Palmyra Atoll 2012
dataTable.entityDescription: Biogeochemical data from Eulerian measurements at the SIB site (data in Fig. 4 of the paper)

attribute.attributeDefinition: Time and date of sampling
Date when data was collected
Tube number at the SIB site

textDomain.definition: Tube number at the SIB site

attribute.attributeDefinition: dissolved inorganic carbon
dissolved oxygen
aragonite saturation state calculated from DIC and TA
pCO2
pH (total scale) calculated from DIC and TA
salinity (psu)-data presented in Fig. 3
DIC salinity-normalized to 34.87
TA salinity-normalized to 34.87
total alkalinity

dataTable.entityName: Koweek et al Eulerian mesurements sites coordinates, Palmyra Atoll 2012
dataTable.entityDescription: SIB site coordinates for Eulerian measurements

attribute.attributeDefinition: Tube number at the SIB site

textDomain.definition: Tube number at the SIB site

attribute.attributeDefinition: latitude coordinate
longitudinal coordinate

dataTable.entityName: Koweek et al Lagrangian drifts coordinates, Palmyra Atoll 2012
dataTable.entityDescription: GPS coordinates for all points along all Lagrangian Drift tracks (drift tracks shown in Fig. 1 of the paper)

attribute.attributeDefinition: Identification number of each lagrangian drift

textDomain.definition: Identification number of each lagrangian drift

attribute.attributeDefinition: position of the coordinate along the lagrangian drift

textDomain.definition: position of the coordinate along the lagrangian drift

attribute.attributeDefinition: latitude coordinate
longitude coordinate

dataTable.entityName: Koweek et al offshhore CTD cast coords, Palmyra Atoll 2012
dataTable.entityDescription: Southern offshore CTD cast GPS coordinates (cast locations shown in Fig. 1 of the paper)

attribute.attributeDefinition: ctd cast id number
Latitude of CTD casts conducted off Palmyra Atoll's southern fore reef
Longitude of CTD casts conducted off Palmyra Atoll's southern fore reef

dataTable.entityName: Koweek et al Metabolice rate data for PCA, Palmyra Atoll 2012
dataTable.entityDescription: Metabolic rate data (NCC, NCP) from Lagrangian and Eulerian methods along with associated environmental and ecological conditions (data in Figs. 2, 5, and 6 of the paper

attribute.attributeDefinition: Method and number of measurements. Either lagrangian (LD) or Eulerian (eg: SIB site Eulerian rate 2012/09/20 10:52) method

textDomain.definition: Method and number of measurements. Either lagrangian (LD) or Eulerian (eg: SIB site Eulerian rate 2012/09/20 10:52) method

attribute.attributeDefinition: Net community calcification
1 standard deviation error estimate on NCC
Net community production
1 standard deviation error estimate on NCP
Ratio of NCC to NCP
Fractional time of day (days; e.g., 0600 hrs=0.25 days, 1200 hrs=0.5 days, 1800 hrs=0.75 days)
Average water temperature during each metabolic rate measurement
Air temperature from meteorological station on Palmyra Atoll
photosynthetically active radiation from meteorological station on Palmyra Atoll
precipitation from meteorological station on Palmyra Atoll
Average percentage of hard coral during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements
Average percentage of macroalgae during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements
Average percentage of crustose coralline algae during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements
Average percentage of Halimeda spp. during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements
Average percentage of turf algae during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements
Ratio of calcifiers to non-calcifiers during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements
Ratio of hard coral to macroalgae during either Lagrangian Drift or over flow path from fore reef to SIB site for Eulerian measurements

dataTable.entityName: Koweek et al Physical oceanographic data of Eulerain measurements, Palmyra Atoll 2012
dataTable.entityDescription: Physical oceanographic data from Eulerian measurements at the SIB site (data in Fig. 3 of the paper)

attribute.attributeDefinition: Date and time of measurement
Tube corresponding to measurement
depth
magnitude of water velocity
compass heading direction of water velocity
bottom temperature
temperature at mid water column (only at tubes 2 and 4)
near-surface water temperature (only at tubes 2 and 4)
travel time from forereef to SIB tubes
time-averaged free surface at SIB site
air temperature from meteorological station on Palmyra Atoll
precipitation from meteorological station on Palmyra Atoll
photosynthetically active radiation from meteorological station on Palmyra Atoll
wind speed at 2m from NASA MERRA global model
wind direction at 2m from NASA MERRA global model
average water density across SIB site
travel time from foreeef to start of drift 16
